cause.description:
Marriage Today is a Ministry with a goal to help marriages, as well as singles, and divorcees. They accomplish this through their television program hosted by Jimmy and Karen Evans, seminars, as well as many books and media.
By Donating money to this ministry, you can help the ministry help more people to foster and care for the most necessary and joyous relationship on the Earth.
1. Marriage is one of the most precious relationships on Earth.
2. Because of divorce, many people including children are left scared by the torn apart relationship
3. Everyone has a right to a great and happy marriage
cause.mission: Help Marriages stay healthy and happy as well as stop the chance of Divorce
cause.name: Marriage Today
